PEPJDProjection

The type of projection to be used in the Jacobi-Davidson solver

Synopsis

typedef enum { PEP_JD_PROJECTION_HARMONIC,
               PEP_JD_PROJECTION_ORTHOGONAL } PEPJDProjection;
